name: Alfirman Ejha Pahlepi
headline: Frontend Developer
description: I enjoy programming and whenever I can I try to learn new things.
about: I'm a passionate dev with +2 year of work experience in JavaScript/TypeScript, I'm a lover of page design or other things and whenever I can I try to learn new technologies since I discovered programming at 18 years old.

experience.description: I have played a pivotal role in the development of Finpoint.id, a web application focused on reconciliation to identify price discrepancies between banks/merchants and principals, built using React. In my position, I have been responsible for designing and implementing dynamic and user-friendly interfaces, ensuring a seamless and efficient reconciliation process. I have contributed to the creation of visually appealing and responsive interfaces that prioritize user experience. Collaborating closely with a talented team of designers, backend developers, and data analysts, I have been instrumental in integrating robust functionality for reconciling and comparing prices. With meticulous attention to detail and a passion for delivering high-quality solutions, I have played a vital role in the success of CODR and the Finpoint.id platform.

I have been instrumental in the development of Verica.id, a cutting-edge web application that offers business digital signature capabilities with Certificate Authorization, built using React. In this role, I have been responsible for designing and implementing highly interactive and intuitive user interfaces, ensuring a seamless and secure digital signing experience. Leveraging my expertise in frontend technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I have contributed to the creation of visually appealing and responsive interfaces that adhere to industry best practices. Collaborating closely with a talented team of designers, backend developers, and security experts, I have played a key role in integrating secure Certificate Authorization protocols and optimizing performance. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for delivering top-notch solutions, I have significantly contributed to the success of Erloom Digital Venture and the Verica.id platform.

I have been actively involved in the development of Skills.id, an educational e-commerce web application. In this role, I have played a crucial part in designing and implementing user-friendly interfaces, ensuring a seamless user experience. Utilizing my expertise in frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with modern frameworks like React, I have successfully contributed to the creation of visually appealing and responsive web pages. Additionally, I have collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, including designers and backend developers, to integrate robust functionalities and optimize performance. With a strong attention to detail and a passion for delivering high-quality solutions, I have consistently contributed to the success of PT Permata Indonesia and Skills.id.
